Instance.description: Situations for Sims who want to sell items but can only do so at certain objects. The big difference between this and a regular SalesTableVendorSituation is that a Sim added to this situation creates an object relationship with an object essentially claiming it. The Sim can then push interactions and have the role_state_overrides change the target automatically or can be tested against to gate certain interactions to only work if the Sim has claimed the object. The Sim must be able to make an object relationship with an object or the situation will self_destruct thinking it has no object to staff. This is one of the reasons why the StaffedObjectSituationMixin wasn't just added to SalesTableVendorSituation.

TunableVariant.name: _object_to_staff_filter
TunableVariant.description: Either a list of object definitions or tags that identify the type of object the Sim in this situation will be staffing.

TunableTuple.name: object_definitions
TunableTuple.description: A Tunable Filter that filters based on specific object definitions.

TunableList.name: items_to_check
TunableList.description: A List of the definitions that can be matched to fulfill the filter. This list is considered a Match Any requirement.

Tunable.description: A reference to a definiton that can be matched as part of the filter.

TunableTuple.name: object_id_from_situation
TunableTuple.description: This option is used to indicate that the object-based situation zone director must pass in a specific object ID. The filtering is performed earlier based on object tags, to create object-based situations.

TunableTuple.name: object_tags
TunableTuple.description: A Tunable Filter that filters based on a tag set.

TunableList.name: tag_set
TunableList.description: A Set of tags that can be matched to fulfill the filter. The set is considered a Match Any requirement.

TunableEnum.description: A reference to a tag that can be matched as part of the filter.

Tunable.name: _unowned_objects_only
Tunable.description: If checked, objects are only valid if they are unowned. For example, if your Sim places down a yoga instruction mat, yoga instructors at a spa venue can have this checked so they don't try to staff your instruction mat.
